channel.title: CVE Feed for Apachefriends -- XAMPP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apachefriends -- XAMPP

item.title: CVE-2024-0338|2024-08-01T18:04:49.195Z -- apachefriends -- xampp
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability has been found in XAMPP affecting version 8.2.4 and earlier. An attacker could execute arbitrary code through a long file debug argument that controls the Structured Exception Handler (SEH).
